name: Yongdeung (Wind Festival)
shortLoreBlurb: Yongdeung (Wind Festival) is a spirits from Korea (Jeju) linked to wind spirits, sea. Connected to tempests and rulership omens. Appeased for safe waters and rain.
overlapsLinks: Indra (Vedic), Naga (India/SE Asia), Perun (Slavic), Poseidon (Greek), Tangaroa (Polynesia), Thor (Norse), Yemaya (Yoruba), Zeus (Greek)
description: Yongdeung (Wind Festival) is a spirits from Korea (Jeju) linked to wind spirits, sea. Connected to tempests and rulership omens. Appeased for safe waters and rain.
